io.proximax.sdk.utils.dto

Class UInt64Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.sdk.utils.dto.UInt64Utils

  • public class UInt64Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to handle conversions between BigInteger and int array
